methods.fs(model, X_train: numpy.ndarray, X_test: numpy.ndarray, y: numpy.ndarray, n=0, tuning=None)¶

Returns a subset of {X_train} and {X_test} with features being selected by the method {model} :param int n: it can be the variance thereshold or the number of chosen features :
